amendment.description: Amendments sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws necessary to protect children from hunger or homelessness.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of two amendments, offered en bloc, to exempt from the provisions of the bill those laws and regulations necessary to protect children from hunger or homelessness. (The amendments were printed as amendment Nos. 39 and 41 in the Congressional Record of January 19, 1995.).

action.text: On agreeing to the Clay amendments (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 277 (Roll no. 63).
